page.shortlink: fieldprops display settings help icon behavior property
page.description: Specify the action when the user clicks the help icon, or moves the mouse over the help icon.

item.name: ShowHelpOnClick
item.description: When the user clicks the help icon, the help text is shown.

item.name: ShowHelpOnMouseOver
item.description: When the user hovers the mouse over the help icon, the help text is shown.
